title: How do I request a PBE account?
body:
Hello, I would like to have a PBE server account, but I do not know the requirements or the process to acquire, someone to help me?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
You can apply for PBE Access using [this signup link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe). Additionally, you can find out how we pick PBE testers and get a general rundown on how the system works by checking out our [PBE FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)

Let me know if you have any questions.
